Breath Of Life (Life5 Conj): Touched corpse dead less than 1 rd resurrected and heals 5d8+20 HP

Greater Restoration (Life7 Conj): Touch dispels magical ability harm and heals all temporary ability damage, restores all drained abilities, removes fatigue or exhaustion and temporary negative levels, and restores all drained levels
Heal (Life6 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 150 HP and removes negative conditions

Mass Heal (Life8 Conj): R75' Targets in 15' radius heal (undead suffer) 150 HP and remove negative conditions
Neutralize Poison (Life3 Conj): Touched neutralized 200 min, immunized, or detoxified
Restoration (Life4 Conj): Dispels magical ability harm from touched and heals all temporary ability damage, restores 1 drained ability, removes fatigue or exhaustion and temporary negative levels, and restores 1 drained level
True Resurrection (Life9 Conj): Fully restores target dead up to 200 yr

Channel Energy: R30' Heal or inflict 10d6 HP (DC 23 Will half) 4/dy
Elemental Spell (Cold): May convert half of spell damage to cold damage
Empower Spell: x1.5 chosen spell variable effects uses +2 spell slot
Enhanced Cures: Level-based healing by Cure spells gives 20 HP
Maximize Spell: Maximize all chosen spell variable effects uses +3 spell slot
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Persistent Spell: Cast spell forcing target to take worse of 2 saving throws uses +2 spell slot
Quicken Spell: Free action casting 1/rd uses +4 spell slot
Reach Spell: Cast spell at longer rage uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Safe Curing: Cure spells do not provoke AOO
Silent Spell: Cast spell w/out speech uses +1 spell slot
Spirit Boost: Up to 20 excess HP from Cure spell become temporary HP for 1 rd
